data.description: An aggressive warrior who can attack again after defeating an enemy.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. Chain to up to <color=#86e619>2</color> adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage. On Kill, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>100%</color>.

Counterattack breaks this Chain.
If Adam Warlock is an ally, this attack can Chain to <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> targets and cannot be <color=#fff568>Countered</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

1.description:
On Spawn, gain +<color=#86e619>4</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>4</color>, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.
If Health is full at the start of a match, Revive once with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + <color=#86e619>20%</color> for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.

On this character's or any <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally's turn, lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. On any ally Adam Warlock's turn, lose <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, instead.
On Turn, if not <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, become <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>. On <color=#fff568>Empowered</color> fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color> + Heal for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the highest Health ally and gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>Empowered</color>, clear <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects from self
<color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> and <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

On Turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> on any enemy that has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the highest Health ally and gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance. <color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> and <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance. Apply +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance to additional allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Always flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> on any enemy that has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance for <color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> and <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies

4.description:

On Turn, flip <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> on any enemy that has <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>.

When this character's Health drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to the highest Health ally and gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance. <color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> and <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance. Apply +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance to additional allies.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10,000%</color> Resistance against <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing for each <color=#fff568>INFINITY WATCH</color> ally
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance for self
